author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Can you add
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot?
You can probably have `Test` as a test-only dependency.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/bjack205/PartedArrays.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- ee30ad10-7c0c-11e9-90b6-d7877161b972 -->
